[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [RenderedConnection](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.md) &gt; [closest](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.closest_1_method.md)

## RenderedConnection.closest() method

Find the closest compatible connection to this connection. All parameters are in workspace units.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
closest(maxLimit: number, dxy: Coordinate): {
        connection: RenderedConnection | null;
        radius: number;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maxLimit | number | The maximum radius to another connection. |
|  dxy | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | Offset between this connection's location in the database and the current location (as a result of dragging). |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ connection: [RenderedConnection](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.md) \| null; radius: number; }

Contains two properties: 'connection' which is either another connection or null, and 'radius' which is the distance.
